plot: You are among the guests on the Conpernicus space station. Voyager's Doctor is there as well to analyze which guests have a special strain of DNA resistant to Borg assimilation. Then the Borg attack. Is there a way to escape?
title: Star Trek: The Experience - Borg Invasion 4D
plot_es: You are among the guests on the Conpernicus space station. Voyager's Doctor is there as well to analyze which guests have a special strain of DNA resistant to Borg assimilation. Then the Borg attack. Is there a way to escape?
